title: El Salvadorâ€™s Bitcoin Banks: Pioneering Crypto-Fiat Fusion Amid Global Skepticism
description: El Salvador is advancing plans for Bitcoin-only banks to integrate cryptocurrency into its financial system, building on its 2021 legal tender adoption. Amid IMF concerns and market volatility, the initiative aims to boost inclusion and economic growth, with launches eyed for late 2025. This bold move defies global skepticism.

title: Bitcoin Wallet Lava Removes Decentralization via Sneaky App Update
description: The growing problem of decentralization theater in crypto rolls on.
